urls.description: Albania, Estonia, Norway, Republic of Moldova and Slovakia reported widespread geographic influenza activity and/or at least medium influenza intensity. 6% of all sentinel primary care specimens from patients presenting with ILI or ARI symptoms tested positive for an influenza virus. Six countries reported seasonal influenza activity at or above 10% positivity in sentinel primary care: Serbia (70%), Hungary (34%), France (28%), Luxembourg (11%), Republic of Moldova (11%) and Sweden (10%). urls.title: Episode 9 - Pasi Penttinen - Everything You Wanted to Know About the Flu (But Didn't Ask) by ECDC: On Air
urls.description: On this episode, we speak with Pasi Penttinen, ECDC expert on coronavirus and influenza. Pasi discusses the reasons why there have been hardly any cases of flu recently, what to expect from the upcoming flu season, and whether the COVID-19 pandemic is really ‚Äòjust like a bad flu season‚Äô. ‚ÄúIn the worst years, we have more than 200,000 people dying in Europe as a result of influenza. Is this really something we should accept as a society?‚Äù Please visit the dedicated ECDC pages for the flu here. You can find additional information via Flu News Europe.
